name: Torch Keeper
description:
Robots are trying to extinquish your torch and smother you in darkness. How long can you keep your flame alive in this roguelike platformer?

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement
  • Space Bar - Interact With Objects
  • Escape Key - Pause Game

Credits:

  • Programming and game design - e-viking
  • Music - https://opengameart.org/content/countdown-to-myocardial-infarction and https://opengameart.org/content/jazzy-vibes-36-loop-smooth-jazz
  • Art - https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-platformer-pack
  • Font - https://www.dafont.com/retro-gaming.font?l[]=10&l[]=1

This was created for the Chill Jam 2023 using Godot - https://itch.io/jam/chill-jam-mike
